name: Elder Village
description:
You have to go to a very small settlement from the ancient past of the lost world. Countryside and proximity of nature. Beauty and a calm land.

You can:
  - walk
  - harvest the cabbage
  - eat vegetables (2)
  - swim in the river
  - carry bags with supplies
  - rest after work
- etc

You are waiting for a rather interesting game - an unusual short adventure.


Update:

- boat
